meanings.definition: A first public appearance or performance.
meanings.sent1: Her debut on stage was met with thunderous applause.
meanings.sent2: The singer's debut album was a huge success.
meanings.sent3: At her debut in the school play, she forgot her lines and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The debut of the new restaurant in town drew in a large crowd.
meanings.sent5: The debut of the sunrise painted the sky in beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: To perform or appear for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The young actress debuts in a new movie next week.
meanings.sent2: The band debuts their latest song at the music festival.
meanings.sent3: The magician debuts his new trick and leaves the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The chef debuts his signature dish on the menu tonight.
meanings.sent5: The athlete debuts in the national competition with a stunning performance.
